name: Apple
description: Sweet–tart flavour, crisp texture. Great for eating fresh or baking.

name: Banana
description: Soft, creamy flesh with a mild sweetness. Perfect snack on-the-go.

name: Mango
description: Often called the ‘king of mangoes’; rich aroma and velvety pulp.

name: Orange
description: Juicy segments, balanced sweetness and citrus zing—great for juice.

name: Grapes
description: Seedless green grapes, firm skin and honey-like flavour.

name: Jackfruit
description: Large tropical fruit with a sweet aroma and fibrous yellow bulbs, great for both raw eating and cooking.
